name: Ghostfolio
short_description: Open source wealth management for portfolio tracking.
description: Open source wealth management for portfolio tracking. Ghostfolio is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, utility, finance, crypto. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Ghostfolio on your home server to open source wealth management for portfolio tracking without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Ghostfolio to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
